name: Moderate Malleable
description: A large, inside-out fleshy creature with chaotic features, capable of absorbing smaller malleables and altering its shape.
memorable: Its ability to absorb minor malleables and transform into larger creatures makes it a unique and multifaceted threat.
goals: To absorb and assimilate other malleables while using its psychic abilities to drain and weaken opponents.
relations: Can be encountered alongside or as a part of a larger hive of malleables.
environment: Typically found in areas where it can easily navigate and dominate through its psychic abilities.
strengths: Immunities to psychic damage and conditions like blinded and prone; ability to heal by absorbing psychic damage.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to attacks requiring agility.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with Flesh Tendrils for grappling targets, inflicting bludgeoning damage, and employs Psychic Drain for significant psychic harm.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to absorb a minor malleable to regain health and incorporate any effects into itself.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
additional_information: Can pass through openings as narrow as one inch due to its Amorphous trait.
Can combine with others to form larger entities for strategic advantages.
Can split into four smaller malleables, redistributing health and conditions.
test_queries: fleshy creature that can split apart
monster with psychic drain and high resilience
creature that combines with others for strength
